Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue

Class ProbabilityParameter

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<Double>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.RangeParameter<Double>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.DoubleParameter
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.ProbabilityParameter
public class ProbabilityParameter extends DoubleParameter
A specialized DoubleParameter that represents a probability value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive). This class is used to ensure that probability values used in evolutionary algorithms remain within the valid range [0.0, 1.0].

Common uses include:

  • Crossover probability (e.g., in genetic algorithms)
  • Mutation probability
  • Any other parameter that represents a probability

This class enforces the constraint that the value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProbabilityParameter

      public ProbabilityParameter(String name)
      Creates a new ProbabilityParameter with the specified name. The value will be constrained to the range [0.0, 1.0].
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter. Must not be null or empty.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or empty
